special_text:
[+1]: Each player mills cards until they’ve milled two nonland cards this way. You lose 2 life.
[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, destroy another target creature or planeswalker.
[-3]: Exile target card from a graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
